titleStmt.title: A modest briefe discussion of some points taught by M. Doctour Kellison in his treatise of the ecclesiasticall hierarchy. By Nicholas Smyth
titleStmt.author: Knott, Edward, 1582-1656.

notesStmt.note: Nicholas Smyth is a pseudonym used by Matthew Wilson, commonly known as Edward Knott.
Actual place of publication and printer from STC.
Errata on verso of N7, final leaf.
An answer to: Kellison, Matthew. A treatise of the hierarchie and divers orders of the Church against the anarchie of Calvin.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
